The end of cute

Published on Monday, December 28, 2020

I have a friend
who is so mad
at the pandemic
that he went on
a six-day crack bender
just to prove it
‚ÄúI‚Äôve deleted the numbers
of all my dealers as well as the
man who changed my mind‚Äù
he tells me
His eyes reflect a me
judging him for him
and I am
I have deleted numbers
deleted apps
food
versions of my
self
myself
‚ÄúAlso I saw your
childhood
friend on an
escort
website
She‚Äôs presenting
as male again‚Äù
